intro.para: 1000 Sentences are a collection of 1000 simple sentences for beginners to practice how to tag the kAraka and kAraketara relations.

For students who are self driven to learn how to analyse slokas on their own, this 1000-Sentences e-reader gives a platform to build their knowledge practicing the same with simple sentences provided here.  Sentences have been framed to cover all kAraka and kAraketara relations. The relations are marked using the Tagging Guidelines document given in samsaadhanii.
Once the initial practice is done with these sentences, learners can try out slokas from any Sanskrit texts of their interest.
